name: Fresh Peach Pie
author: Zeta Welter

ingredients.name: Prepared pie crust or graham cracker crust
pkg. Jell-O peach or mixed fruit (3 oz.)

instructions: Place sliced peaches in pie shell. Mix water, sugar and corn- starch together and cook until clear. Remove from heat and add 1 package peach Jell-O or mixed fruit. Let cool, pour over peaches. Then whip 1 package Dream Whip according to directions on box. Add cream cheese and powdered sugar. Spread over pie.
